Modifications.Value: Gives a 20% chance that an attack will restores hit points of nearby friendly units equal to half the physical damage dealt by the hero within a radius of 300.
Gives a 30% chance that an attack will restores hit points of nearby friendly units equal to half the physical damage dealt by the hero within a radius of 300.
Gives a 40% chance that an attack will restores hit points of nearby friendly units equal to half the physical damage dealt by the hero within a radius of 300.
Gives a 50% chance that an attack will restores hit points of nearby friendly units equal to half the physical damage dealt by the hero within a radius of 300.
